properties.name: elevation
properties.description: How raised the component should appear in relation to its surrounding.

properties.name: semitransparent
properties.description: If true, fill color will have a semi transparent style.

properties.name: rounded
properties.description: If true, component will have rounded corners.

properties.name: paddingHorizontal
properties.description: How much padding should be added to the section on the left and right edges.

properties.name: paddingVertical
properties.description: How much padding should be added to the section on the top and bottom edges.

properties.name: fillColor
properties.type:
container
| surface
| float
| primary
| secondary
| tertiary
| default
| danger
| warning
| success
| info
| invert
| none
properties.description: Fill color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this role.

properties.name: outlineColor
properties.type:
container
| surface
| float
| primary
| secondary
| tertiary
| default
| danger
| warning
| success
| info
| invert
| none
properties.description: If set, will show an outline border with the specified color scheme. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this role

properties.name: textColor
properties.type:
primary
| secondary
| tertiary
| default
| danger
| warning
| success
| info
| invert
| auto
properties.description: Text color of the section. If set to auto - the component auto selects the foreground color as dark or light, depending on dynamic contrast with fillColor. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this role

properties.name: gutterBottom
properties.description: If true, a margin space will be added below the component.

properties.name: fullWidth
properties.description: If true, the component will take up the full width of its container.
